title: Disaster Risk Reduction and Earthquake Emergency Management Capacity-Building Training

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental disaster management concepts and administrative procedures
context.additional_context: Small-scale advanced training for office/administrative professionals conducted in limited-technology environments primarily using smartphones

learning_goals: Perform initial response procedures (communication system establishment, priority judgment for rescue operations) in earthquake simulations with over 80% accuracy
Write organizational risk assessment reports applying ISO 22320-compliant disaster management frameworks
Teams present and defend essential emergency resource allocation strategies within 72 hours post-earthquake through project-based VR training

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
